hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I like watching football pharmacy department altnagelvin hospital Yoga Raves bring the yoga studio to the club -- so don't forget your glow sticks (and glitter). Combining music, movement and meditation in a single space, Yoga Raves also promote drug-free fun. Many of these raves begin with a guided meditation as a warm up, to lead into a more free movement.According to the not-for-profit movement's website Yogarave.org, "The Yoga Rave Project will bring the spiritual element back to celebration and the way we have fun, offering a drug free alternative for our youth to gather and release their energy and tension."The Art Of Living Foundation, which funds and organizes Yogaraves.org, is not the only initiative propelling the yoga dance party. Jivamukti and Laughing Lotus are among the yoga schools supporting the combination of yoga and "getting down."Yogadork.com might have said it best: "The Yoga Rave: a place where you can totally trip out drug free, get friendly with your fellow man/woman and wake up in your own bed the next morning (if you so choose)."
